text: Kay is an American jewelry company that is all around the world. Its slogan is, "Every kiss begins with Kay". The tag line was written in 1997 by a Senior Art Director named Randall Herrera working for an agency called Stern Advertising in Pepperpike Ohio. It was one of several lines offered up to Kay Jewelers and is still going strong to this day. Saturday, June 27, 2020 Its headquarters are in Akron, Ohio. ==References== Category:Jewelry Category:Companies based in Ohio Category:Akron, Ohio
title: Kay Jewelers
